title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 200.7 - Publication
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 200.7 - Publication

State Regulations

Upon the promulgation of an approved marketing order, an
effective date therefor shall be entered by the commissioner who shall publish
the same in accordance with section
19
of the Agriculture and Markets Law and section
102
of the

Executive Law. A copy of such order shall be filed with the secretary of the
department and posted on a board for that purpose maintained by the Division of

Markets. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
200.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
